attributes.action: Make sign language a compulsory lesson on school curriculum
attributes.additional_details: I believe it should be compulsory for everyone to learn sign language and I think sign language could definitely replace either French, German or any other languages taught as you are more like to meet a deaf person or people than travel to another country.
attributes.background: The government should add sign language to the curriculum or if there isn’t a way to add a class then replace it with another language taught class.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make British Sign Language (BSL) a compulsory subject in the national curriculum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576713

Make British Sign Language a language option in the national curriculum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579898
